find: /<xf:textboxrow name="{\$fieldName}" value="{\$value}" type="email" autocomplete="email" required="required".*?hint="{{ phrase\('required'\) }}" \/>/is
replace:
<xf:textboxrow name="{$fieldName}" value="{$value}" type="email" autocomplete="email" required="required"
		maxlength="{{ max_length($xf.visitor, 'email') }}"
		label="{{ phrase('email') }}"
		explain="{{ phrase('fs_registration_step_email_explain') }}"
		hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" />
